sentences.sentence: He might take a clip of a mollusk going up and down in the water and set it to music.
sentences.translation: 他可能会截取软体动物在水里上上下下的片段，然后配上音乐。

sentences.sentence: The name of the mollusk was porcelaine.
sentences.translation: 而且，porcelaine曾经就是这种软体动物的名称。

sentences.sentence: I swear I have never seen such a mollusk with thorns all over its body.
sentences.translation: 我敢发誓我从来没有见过这种全身长满棘刺的软体动物。
